data.approach: Analyzing requirements for a client feedback portal. Will explore architectures: (1) Supabase-backed web portal syncing to local SQLite, (2) Browser extension for element/screenshot capture, (3) Hybrid approaches. Need to understand current SQUAD architecture constraints first.

summary: Analyzed current SQUAD architecture for task creation
Evaluated 4 approaches: Supabase portal, browser extension, embeddable widget, hybrid
Recommended phased approach starting with Supabase portal
Detailed architecture diagrams for each option
findings: Tasks stored in local SQLite via Beads (.beads/ directory)
IDE creates tasks via POST /api/tasks which calls bd CLI
Current flow requires manual relay of user feedback
Supabase portal offers best balance of complexity vs. capability
recommendedActions: Phase 1: Implement Supabase portal with per-project links
Phase 2: Add embeddable widget for in-context bug reports
Phase 3: Optional browser extension for QA power users

summary: Conceptualized a user feedback portal for SQUAD task input
Explored multiple implementation strategies including web portal and browser extension
Defined key requirements for improved user task submission workflow

suggestedTasks.title: Design Prototype for SQUAD User Feedback Portal
suggestedTasks.description: Create a low-fidelity prototype for the SQUAD user feedback portal using Figma or Sketch. Define core user flow for task submission, including fields, validation, and integration points with existing SQUAD system. Focus on creating an intuitive, streamlined interface that reduces friction in task creation process.
suggestedTasks.reason: Initial design exploration needed to validate concept

suggestedTasks.title: Technical Feasibility Study for Task Submission Methods
suggestedTasks.description: Conduct a detailed technical assessment comparing web portal and browser extension approaches for SQUAD task input. Evaluate pros and cons of each method, including authentication, data storage, API integration, and cross-platform compatibility. Produce a comprehensive report with recommended implementation strategy.
suggestedTasks.reason: Need clear technical direction before development begins

patterns: Prioritize user experience and minimal friction
gotchas: Ensure robust authentication and data security
Handle potential variance in user input and task metadata

documentationNeeds: Create initial requirements document for user feedback portal
